author: PANDAKO-GitHub
description:
Add this behavior to a rectangular sprite object.
That sprite object is the extent to which the user can work with the list.

This behavior requires four other objects.
- Sprite object for background
- Sprite object for icon
- Text object for title
- Text object for text

An item is created with the four objects.
You can create a list with multiple items arranged vertically.

The object variable "ListItems" is created in the sprite object to which this behavior is added.
name: SimpleScrollableListExtension

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: You can create a list with multiple items arranged vertically.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SimpleScrollableListBehavior

eventsFunctions.description: Create a list from the object variable "ListItems".
eventsFunctions.name: CreateList
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create a list of _PARAM0_ with _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_, _PARAM4_ and _PARAM5_ and scroll to _PARAM6_

parameters.description: Scroll position of the first line (Number of pixels from the origin of this object)
parameters.name: ScrollPosition

eventsFunctions.description:
Create a list from Json Text.
Example:
{
"0":{"Icon":"A", "Title":"AAA", "Text":"aaa"},
"1":{"Icon":"B", "Title":"BBB", "Text":"bbb"},
...
}
eventsFunctions.name: CreateListFromJsonText
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create a list of _PARAM0_ from _PARAM7_ with _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_, _PARAM4_ and _PARAM5_ and scroll to _PARAM6_

parameters.description: Scroll position of the first line (Number of pixels from the origin of this object)
parameters.name: ScrollPosition

eventsFunctions.description: This action must be performed every frame to scroll or select the list.
eventsFunctions.name: DoStepEvent
eventsFunctions.sentence: Do a step event with a list of _PARAM0_ created by _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_, _PARAM4_ and _PARAM5_

events.comment: Refresh Position (It is written here to avoid bugs.)

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an item in the list is selected.
eventsFunctions.name: IsSelected
eventsFunctions.sentence: An item in the list of _PARAM0_ was selected

eventsFunctions.description:
This returns the string for the selected item.
Child Name is "Title" or "Text" or "Icon".
eventsFunctions.name: SelectedSrting

eventsFunctions.description: This returns the current scroll position.
eventsFunctions.name: ScrollPosition

eventsFunctions.description: Add an item to the end of the object variable "ListItems".
eventsFunctions.name: AddItem
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add an item made of _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_, and _PARAM4_ to ListItems of _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.name: RemoveItem
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remove item of _PARAM2_th from ListItems of _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.name: ClearListItems
eventsFunctions.sentence: Clear all items of _PARAM0_ created by _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_, _PARAM4_ and _PARAM5_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the index is selected.
eventsFunctions.name: IsIndexSelected

eventsFunctions.description:
Check if the string is selected.
Child Name is "Title" or "Text" or "Icon".
eventsFunctions.name: IsStringSelected
